structure.unit: ARTICLE IX. WELLS (OPEN IRRIGATION HOLES) IN AGRICULTURAL FIELDS OPEN TO PUBLIC

text.section:
Sec. 21-113. Functional wells.
Any well in a field open to the public must be covered with a cap sufficient to withstand three hundred (300) pounds in weight. Each cap shall be painted bright red. Any such well shall also be marked by a small, triangular, colored flag.
